name: FinnishNationalHoliday
0:
”Alexa ask Finnish National Holidays what is the next holiday”
”Alexa ask Finnish National Holidays which holidays are in January”
”Alexa ask Finnish National Holidays about New Year's Day”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: finnish national holidays
des:
The Finnish National Holidays skill keeps you up to date on the Finnish National Holidays. Get to know the next upcoming holiday, the holidays in a specified month or more information about a holiday. 

To open the skill and to get the next holiday, ask "Alexa, open Finnish National Holidays". The skill will respond with the next upcoming holiday and will ask you if you would like any more information about said holiday.

You can ask the skill for a holiday on a specific date by asking for example "Alexa, ask Finnish National Holidays what holiday is in May 1st" or "Alexa, ask Finnish National Holidays what holiday is in tomorrow". The skill will respond with info about the holiday in that date, or will reply that the date mentioned is not a holiday in
Finland.

You can also get holidays in a month by asking "Alexa, ask Finnish National Holidays which holidays are in June" (or any other month), and the skill tell you which holidays are in the given month.

To list all holidays in the current year in Finland, ask "Alexa, ask Finnish National Holidays to list all the holidays". The skill will respond with a list of all holidays and their dates.

To get help with the skill, ask "Alexa, ask Finnish National Holidays for help". You can also ask "Repeat" any time in the skill to repeat the last sentence.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
